column4: hello.. I'm having a strange dependency problem with package totem-xine.. my goal was to get video support in firefox.. I could describe the problem in words .. but its just as easy to show the problem .. so I have pastebin'd it here http://www.copypot.com/675
essientially the problem is that it wants to remove ubuntu-desktop .. which I'd assume would be bad
well it also wants to remove totem
nope.  u-d is a meta package, it can be removed fine.  However, you should reinstall it before upgrading to edgy (and that'll reinstall whatever you're currently removing)
